zujkomiller.genetic
Interface EvolutionObservable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Evolver
public interface EvolutionObservable

Classes implementing EvolutionObserver may register themselves with classes which implement this interface, EvolutionObservable, so that they will be notified when new generations are created and tested for fitness.

Method Summary
 void addEvolutionObserver(EvolutionObserver observer)
          Adds an EvolutionObserver to this EvolutionObservable.
 int getNumberOfGenerationsRun()
           
 int getTopScore()
           
 Chromosome[] getTopScorers()
           
 void removeEvolutionObserver(EvolutionObserver observer)
          Removes the given EvolutionObserver from the set of observers.
 

Method Detail

addEvolutionObserver

public void addEvolutionObserver(EvolutionObserver observer)
Adds an EvolutionObserver to this EvolutionObservable. When a new generation has been created and tested for fitness, the EvolutionObserver passed in as a parameter will be notified.
Parameters:
observer - An EvolutionObserver which wishes to be notified when a generation has been created and tested for fitness.

removeEvolutionObserver

public void removeEvolutionObserver(EvolutionObserver observer)
Removes the given EvolutionObserver from the set of observers.
Parameters:
observer - The EvolutionObserver to remove from the set of observers.

getTopScore

public int getTopScore()
Returns:
The top score attained by any Chromosome so far.

getTopScorers

public Chromosome[] getTopScorers()
Returns:
An array of Chromosome which have each attained a fitness score equal to the top score attained so far. These Chromosomes may have been created in different generations.

getNumberOfGenerationsRun

public int getNumberOfGenerationsRun()
Returns:
The number of generations created so far.
